description: Uploaded by https://gitlab.com/gitlab-com/runbooks/-/jobs/4931849572 at Wed Aug 23 14:19:08 UTC 2023

panels.description: Error rates are a measure of unhandled service exceptions per second. Client errors are excluded when possible. Lower is better

seriesOverrides.alias: 6h Degradation SLO (5% of monthly error budget)
1h Outage SLO (2% of monthly error budget)

targets.legendFormat: 6h Degradation SLO (5% of monthly error budget)
1h Outage SLO (2% of monthly error budget)

panels.title: gitlab-static Service Error Ratio

targets.expr:
sum (
  label_replace(
    vector(0) and on() (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_1h{env="ops",environment="ops",monitor="global",type="gitlab-static"}),
    "period", "na", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(1) and on() (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_5m{env="ops",environment="ops",monitor="global",type="gitlab-static"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (14.4 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="",monitor="global",type="gitlab-static"})),
    "period", "5m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(2) and on() (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_1h{env="ops",environment="ops",monitor="global",type="gitlab-static"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (14.4 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="",monitor="global",type="gitlab-static"})),
    "period", "1h", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(4) and on() (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_30m{env="ops",environment="ops",monitor="global",type="gitlab-static"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (6 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="",monitor="global",type="gitlab-static"})),
    "period", "30m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(8) and on() (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_6h{env="ops",environment="ops",monitor="global",type="gitlab-static"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (6 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="",monitor="global",type="gitlab-static"})),
    "period", "6h", "", ""
  )
)

panels.description: The operation rate is the sum total of all requests being handle for all components within this service. Note that a single user request can lead to requests to multiple components. Higher is busier.
panels.title: gitlab-static Service RPS - Requests per Second

panels.title: gitlab_static_net_zone SLI RPS - Requests per Second

panels.content:
### Description

Aggregation of all public traffic for gitlab-static.net.

Errors on this SLI *may* indicate that the WAF has detected
malicious traffic and is blocking it or upstream errors
processing the request.
panels.title: Details

panels.title: web_ide_worker SLI RPS - Requests per Second

panels.content:
### Description

Cloudflare Worker used by our VS Code-based Web IDE to pull assets from *.cdn.web-ide.gitlab-static.net.
